import React, { Component } from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { MDBContainer, MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBBtn } from "mdbreact"; import { addclienttoDB } from "../../actions/clientAction"; export class Signup extends Component { componentDidMount() { this.props.addclient({ firstname: "oussema", lastname: "othmen", street: "Rue sousse", city: "Beja", avatar: "", email: "salonkhaled", phone: 25144758, password: "password", gender: "Homme", age: 27, }); } render() { return (

Créer mon compte

); } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({}); const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => ({ addclient: (client) => dispatch(addclienttoDB(client)), }); export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(Signup);
